circumstances.circumstancesOfRecovery: Lester suffered an apparent cardiac episode in the gambling area of the El Cortez Casino on 08/19/1979.  He was transported to UMC (formerly Southern Nevada Memorial Hospital) by Mercy ambulance where he expired. His property & money (unknown amount) was removed by ER staff with exception of one white ring with 3 clear stones present and 4 missing stones.

notes.description: The decedent was identified by fingerprints in 2021 by FBI to a 9th US  Civil Service District.  The decedent was applying for a janitor position with Federal Security Agency, USPHS, US Marine Hospital, Kirkwood, MO.  The decedent had listed his address as 2233 Walnut, St. Louis, MO on 03/01/1943. The decedent listed past addresses as 709 N. Ewing, St. Louis, MO in 1941 and 2816 Lucas Avenue, St. Louis, MO in 1938.   He stated that he was fingerprinted before at CC Camp Marion Hospital in 1937.  Another registration card from when he lived at 709 N. Ewing Street, St. Louis, MO, listed his birthplace as East Carondelet, Illinois. His "Person who will always know your address" was listed as Sarah Smith at 4244 Enright, St. Louis, MO.  He was employed at Welding Training School, 6701 Manchester, St. Louis, MO.

circumstances.circumstancesOfRecovery: he decedent was last known to be alive on 02/19/2022 between 1730 and 1930 hours, when a friend, Caleb Thomas, assisted him in the bathroom.  At that time, the decedent reportedly had no complaints.  On 02/20/2022 at approximately 0930 hours, after being unable to contact the decedent, a friend and neighbor, Craig Smyres, contacted the building’s maintenance technician, Sandra Kleider, to perform a welfare check.  Ms. Kleider and Mr. Smyres gained entry into the residence using a passkey and found the decedent unresponsive.  Mr. Thomas was found sleeping on the floor in the living room.  911 was contacted at 0933 hours.  At 0937 hours, Regional Emergency Medical Services Authority (REMSA) arrived on scene.  Due to obvious signs of death, no lifesaving measures were performed.  Death was declared at 0940 hours by REMSA Paramedic Cory.
